name: Flowing Purity
description:
When played and when the Round ends: The character gains 1 Bond of Life stack.
Before both sides choose their actions: If the attached character does not have Bond of Life attached, then generate 1 random basic Elemental Die, and character will deal +1 DMG the next time they deal DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
